statements: SELECT * FROM BiopharmaceuticalProducts;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, storage_temperature FROM BiopharmaceuticalProducts;
SELECT * FROM BiopharmaceuticalProducts WHERE manufacturer = 'Pfizer';
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM BiopharmaceuticalProducts WHERE storage_temperature < 5;
SELECT product_id, product_name, expiration_date FROM BiopharmaceuticalProducts ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM BiopharmaceuticalProducts WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, storage_temperature FROM BiopharmaceuticalProducts WHERE storage_temperature > 4;
SELECT manufacturer, storage_conditions FROM BiopharmaceuticalProducts WHERE manufacturer = 'BioTech Inc' ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, distribution_facility, expiration_date FROM BiopharmaceuticalProducts WHERE storage_temperature < -20;
SELECT DISTINCT manufacturer FROM BiopharmaceuticalProducts WHERE storage_temperature < 0;
SELECT * FROM Distribution WHERE quantity > 50
SELECT product_name, location FROM Distribution WHERE location = 'Warehouse A'
SELECT id, product_name, quantity FROM Distribution ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Distribution WHERE location = 'Warehouse B' AND quantity < 100
SELECT * FROM Storage ORDER BY temperature DESC, humidity ASC
SELECT * FROM Distribution ORDER BY product_name DESC, quantity ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Distribution WHERE location='Warehouse' AND storage_conditions='Dry';
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM Storage WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60;
SELECT product_name, quantity, location FROM Distribution WHERE storage_conditions='Cool' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM Distribution GROUP BY location HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY total_products DESC;
SELECT product_name, storage_condition FROM biopharmaceutical_products;
SELECT * FROM distribution_centers ORDER BY center_name DESC;
SELECT product_id, distribution_date, quantity FROM product_distribution WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM product_distribution WHERE distribution_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT center_name, location FROM distribution_centers WHERE temperature_controlled = true;
SELECT product_name, storage_condition, distribution_center_id FROM biopharmaceutical_products;
SELECT center_name, location, temperature_controlled FROM distribution_centers ORDER BY center_name DESC;
SELECT distribution_id, distribution_date, quantity FROM product_distribution WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY distribution_date ASC;

SELECT p.product_name, d.location, pd.quantity FROM biopharmaceutical_products p JOIN product_distribution pd ON p.product_id = pd.product_id JOIN distribution_centers d ON pd.center_id = d.center_id WHERE pd.quantity >= 50 ORDER BY p.product_name ASC, pd.quantity DESC;

SELECT p.product_name, d.center_name, pd.distribution_date, pd.quantity FROM product_distribution pd JOIN biopharmaceutical_products p ON pd.product_id = p.product_id JOIN distribution_centers d ON pd.center_id = d.center_id WHERE pd.distribution_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM DistributionCenters;
SELECT id, name, location FROM DistributionCenters ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, location, capacity FROM DistributionCenters WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT name, location FROM DistributionCenters WHERE id = 3;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM Products;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE storage_condition = 'Dry';
SELECT name, description FROM Products WHERE id = 3;
SELECT id, location, capacity FROM DistributionCenters ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM QualityControl WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60;

SELECT Products.name AS ProductName, QualityControl.temperature AS Temperature FROM Products INNER JOIN QualityControl ON Products.id = QualityControl.product_id WHERE QualityControl.temperature < 10;
SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT product_name, storage_conditions FROM Products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT center_name, location FROM DistributionCenters ORDER BY center_name DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, quantity, shipment_date FROM Shipments WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT log_id, action, log_date FROM TrackingLogs WHERE product_id = 2 AND distribution_center_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, storage_conditions FROM Products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT center_name, location FROM DistributionCenters WHERE distribution_center_id = 2;
SELECT product_id, distribution_center_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Shipments GROUP BY product_id, distribution_center_id;
SELECT * FROM QualityControl WHERE temperature > 20 AND humidity < 50 ORDER BY temperature ASC, humidity DESC;
